Welcome

I am an assistant professor in the philosophy department at New Jersey City University. I specialize in ancient Greek philosophy, especially in Aristotleâ€™s metaphysics and natural philosophy. You can find links to my research here and my CV here.

I received my PhD from Cornell University in 2013, where I was advised by Gail Fine, Terence Irwin, and Theodore Brennan. Before Cornell, I received my BPhil from Oxford University and my BA from Trinity College, Dublin.
